detail.description: Hinduja Global Solutions Ltd is engaged in the business of business process management (BPM). It offers voice and non-voice based services such as contact center solutions and back office transaction processing across the globe.[1] The company is a part of Hinduja Group which has presence in Automotive, information Technology, media, entertainment & communications, infrastructure project, development, oil & specialty chemicals, power, real estate and healthcare. It employs ~200,000 people globally.[2]
